name: userscripts
description: * install a proxy script with @require tag ```js // ==UserScript== // ... whatever ... // @require    http://localhost:5500/script.user.js // ==/UserScript== ``` * Make sure `Externals	 Update Interval:` is set to `always` in the settings * Run `live server`in vsCode, or something like `python -m http.server 5500` in the terminal and vim to edit the script * No need to update version or click script update in tampermonkey while developing, but two page reloads is needed:
